§c[Small Sun]§1

While the Moon counters darkness through illusion, the Sun burns it away. §cSmall Sun§1 conjures a ball of magickal fire that lights up an area. This ball of fire also has a second use though.§r
§1All undead creatures take damage while in the vicinity of this orb of fire until they either die or leave its range. The miniature sun can be extinguished with a Lunar Crystal.
